name: Morgan B
text: We tried to go to Alford Avenue antiques, the first address online was wrong and we ended up at an abandoned building in the middle of nowhere. Tried a second address for Alford and ended up here at the Vintage Shoppes, which come to find out from reading online IS Alford Avenue Antiques. Alford had operating hours posted online which stated they are open until 7,  whereas the Vintage Shoppes apparently close at 5 now. Even still, we got there before 5 and it was already closed, although there was a huge OPEN sign in the window with a tiny in comparison CLOSED sign near it. Altogether frustrating experience, store might be fine we wouldn’t know.

resp.text: Since COVID, Updating the hours across the Internet has been a challenge. Thank you for taking the time to visit The Vintage Shoppes today and we hope that you can find time to visit again in the future. Once inside, you will find curated spaces by Alford Avenue antiques as well as other vendors throughout the space. Sorry that your Experience today made you give one star. The vendors at the vintage Shoppes work very diligently to provide good merchandise and good service to shoppers. We would all like to think we are far better than one star and hope that you would reconsider your rating of this small business.

name: laurie lawson
text: Fun vintage shops with great lighting and a plethora of merchandise. It is all displayed in a way that is not overpowering and the store is designed that walking through the little rooms make you feel like you are discovering treasures at every turn. In fact we discovered and purchased this adorable vintage hat for my niece.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting today. Customers like you and others we welcome at The Vintage Shoppes are the lifeblood of a small business.  We appreciate the warm review. Thank you. Please come again soon! Enjoy the hat! #ShopSmall

name: Katrina Hunkapiller
text: Very unique, gorgeous selection to fit any home/style for great prices! Loved how organized it was and the art gallery/furniture store set up and design. I went to find another item to meet the $20 minimum to pay with card and ended up going home with two items I love!

resp.text: Katrina, thank you so much for taking the time to visit today. The Vintage Shoppes and it’s Vendor’s work diligently to ensure our guests have a wonderful shopping experience. Times are challenging now and every transaction and every customer visit is extremely important. Thank you for being an important part of our survival. Thank you so very much for taking the time to support this small business. Stay safe!

name: Sherika Heard
text: I visited this place with my husband and small child, I was highly satisfied with my purchase but my husband felt that the customer service did not come off as pleasant. He was asked for an ID for a $20 purchase which he felt was unnecessary. Without inquiring about why we had to show ID, the cashier began to state that it was mandatory for all card purchases. Unfortunately my husband does not feel comfortable spending any more money at this store.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing. Apologies if the delivery of our ID requirement could have been softer. There is a sign posted at the register alerting shoppers that purchases must be greater than $20 to swipe and the name on the card must match your photo ID. As retailers we prevent fraud far more often than many consumers realize and we take every precaution to prevent it from happening at The Vintage Shoppes. It is unfortunate that you decided that our commitment to your security warranted 3 stars. This small business deserves more than 3 stars just as you deserve for every small shop to regard security as high as sales. For the same reason your husband “does not feel comfortable” shopping in The Vintage Shoppes, there are many more who shop with us because they appreciate our diligence.  This small business appreciates you as we wish you safety, blessings and prosperity.

name: Lynda Pierce
text: Great experience shopping today. Much more everything than I expected. Great selection, great prices, great pieces. Could not bring anything home today but I am still thinking about my visit so I guess I will return tomorrow to purchase something I had my eye on. Most places like this are a little grimy but not this one. It’s a new place in my rotation!

name: Theresa LoRusso
text: Really rude staff at the front register. Place itself is cute but they need to hire someone more welcoming for sure.

name: Jillian Everett
text: The store is absolutely beautiful and has some really amazing items. I spent quite a while in the shop today and found two perfect Christmas presents for family. When I took my items to the counter, I told the associate how amazing the store was and that this was my very first time seeing it. However, the items I got didn’t ring up to $20, so I was told they would only take cash or I couldn’t make the purchase. Only all I had on me was credit cards and I had an afternoon appointment so I didn’t have time to go to an atm and come back. I’m really disappointed. It would be nice for first time customers to get a little grace on the first purchase since I had no idea I would need to bring cash. Or maybe have more signage around the store? The only sign was at the checkout counter and the writing was so small, I didn’t notice it until I was finished shopping.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking time to visit the store. As with any business The Vintage Shoppes has a minimum of $20 for us to swipe anything which is posted in a nice little frame at the register. It’s unfortunate that this upset you so that you have given the place three stars because of that but we hope that you might come and visit us again in the future. Small businesses have to take steps of this manner to keep it going one more day. This small business appreciates your support.

name: Shea B.
text: This place is fantastic! It's so clean and organized, the staff is super friendly, and you could go through the store three times and still find new stuff. Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you so very much for visiting with us! Our vendors work diligently to make each experience a fun one. Your kind words are a pat on the back for all involved. This small business appreciates support and encouragement from you and customers like you. Have a great day and please visit again soon.

name: Kim Cornett
text: Nice merchandise, nice owner. I had a somewhat unpleasant first impression of the staff, but the owner reached out immediately and made me feel better about my visit. The atmosphere, merchandise, and owner are enough for me to return.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to provide service. We will never be perfect but will will always appreciate the opportunity to provide good, better and best services to our customers. Again, thank you for your feedback.

name: Robin Ferguson
text: Found a pair of gorgeous candle holders today. The owners and staff are always friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to both visit the store front and leave a review. Sometimes people have a good experience somewhere and they don’t have time to leave a review but you made time to review us and we really appreciate it...thank you! Our vendors are very sincere about curating great items at great prices. We’re making changes every day and working on ways to Expand our offerings and appeal to new people and keep it interesting for repeat supporters each day. Thank you for your purchase. Please follow us on Instagram and Facebook. This small business appreciates your support.  Have a great day.

name: JewelryCash ByMail
text: The jewelry is great. Something for everyone. More fine jewelry selections needed. We may consign some with them. The staff is uncommonly friendly.

resp.text:
Thank you for the feedback on the jewelry. We are eager to implement your suggestions!
Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Sandra P
text: Department store style antique mall selection with affordable marketplace prices! Beautiful, convenient space to shop. Definitely a must see!

resp.text: This small business appreciate your support.

name: Connie Schweigert
text: Warm, helpful staff. Big selection, artfully displayed.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for complementing our staff. Our selection is expanding each day. Since we haven’t been open very long we’re still getting the hang of things but supporters like you are helping us understand what items you seek and vendors are working diligently to curate those items as well as unique items you may not even realize you need. Haha. This small business appreciates your support.

name: Hiram Jessup
text: Just happened to go in and found most of what my son needed for his new apartment. This place is a hidden gem. Excellent merchandise and prices.

resp.text: You and your family were such fun! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Merritt Smith
text: Beautiful shop with a unique and wide variety of decor/furniture and jewelry and many other things!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Drew Barnes
text: Loved my Shopping experience at The Vintage Shoppes. Reasonable prices and a broad spectrum of history to re- love.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers.

name: Sophie Franklin
text: This business has scammed so many people out of money.  She promotes under various business names (she will introduce herself under Signature Estate Sales but ask you to pay her under Alford Avenue Antiques and now this!). She does this, so that consumers are unable to find reports of her frauding others.  She he does not pay you what you are owed or she will not pay you at all. She makes up prices at the register because her employees don't know how to price items.  Her employees are also very unprofessional and she blames them for whenever something goes wrong.  It is not the employees fault, but the business owner should be held responsible. Her estate sales are very unorganized, and you will find consistent reviews noting this as well. Please if you are working with Signature Estate Sales, please note that you are also working with Alford Avenue Antiques and NOW The Vintage Shoppes, where you will find she has scammed many indivduals who did not know she was operating under two (now three) different business names. She must be stopped from deceiving others before this all goes too far. I feel sorry for anyone who has fell victim to her scams.

name: Angelia Harrison
text: I did not get a chance to look for long. But i was very impress with the lady that work there very nice and friendly

resp.text: Thank you so very much for taking the time to peruse the store. All of the vendors work very diligently to keep it nice. Thank you for the compliment of the front desk team member because Nothing happens without them. We look forward to your next visit! Please join us for our Christmas Party Sale, Sunday, Dec. 15, 12:30-4:30. Santa will be at the store taking photos with adults and children! Refreshments, door prizes, discounts and fun!

name: Sassafras Market and Coffee
text: OMG ...Amazing place!!!  Shopping here first from now on. Terrific prices.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Small business only thrives when great people on our team take great care of our customers..enjoy the coffee mugs!

name: Stephanie Frakes
text: 1st time in, Butter Bean vintage section is my favorite!

resp.text: Stephanie thank you so much for visiting! Butter Bean Vintage is a great shoppe...and there are more to explore as well. This small business appreciates your support. Thank you for sharing your experience with others.

name: Susan B
text: Found a one of a kind piece...

resp.text: Susan, the vendors at The Vintage Shoppes greatly appreciate you “shopping small.” It’s icing on the cake that you found something you loved enough to purchase. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Please join us for our open house, Tuesday, November 12th from 4-6:30. This small business appreciates YOU!

name: ty den
text: I could spend forever here

resp.text: Thank you so very much. Hopefully you found a treasure that you made your own. We appreciate you visiting and taking the time to share your experience. Like many small businesses, we are struggling with a smile. It is only supporters like you who keep us going and looking forward to light at the end of the tunnel. Thank you for your support of this small business. Please keep shopping small. Kisses and hugs! The Vintage Shoppes

name: Jobaida Akther
text: There are many items but the price seems to be very high compared to other used product shops.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us. Most of our customers find our prices to be very affordable for their condition and age. We hope that you will continue to visit the individual vendor booths throughout the store and find even more great items within your budget. Thank you for your support of this small business.

name: purplebananas
text: Ok selection but overall overpriced and limited.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting the Shoppe. It’s unfortunate you didn’t have five star experience. Most customers find our prices and selection to be quite good but for those seeking more of a thrift store pricing scheme, their needs will likely not be met. The vendors take great pride in sourcing the items they present and for small business that comes at a slightly higher rate. Thank you for shopping small and trying out the Vintage Shoppes. Please consider visiting again and perhaps we will have something that is more to your liking. Have a wonderful day.

name: Carl Cathey
text: Cool place with a great selection

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to support a small business, Carl! We are glad you enjoyed the store. Our vendors And store team work very hard to create positive customer experiences. Please visit again soon! Have a great weekend.

name: Angie Cacioppo
text: Interesting shopping

resp.text: Angie, thank you for taking the time to comment on the Shoppe! It is a labor of love for everyone involved and we strive to ensure that shoppers like you have an experience that is interesting, memorable, neat, clean and organized so that you will want to return. Thank you so much for your support of this small business. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Deb Paradise
text: Absolutely amazing place.

name: Aaron the Nomad
text: Blank is simply a cozy coffee shop that has great vibes. It is the perfect place to get a Quick coffee or just sit and do some reading. The environment is calm, peaceful, and always has some classic tunes playing.

name: Spencer Williams
text: Loved it! I was visiting from out of town and needed a place to chill. The two staff I met were super friendly and cool, they let us play board games while we hung out. Food options are limited to muffins, but they have a decent drink selection. Small comic and record selection, but a really awesome place.

resp.text: Out of towners are our favorites. You guys get it! We get you, too.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: Keishun is wonderful and makes an excellent cup of coffee! Love it.

name: Jay B
text: Interesting collection of things being sold in the shop. Nice little place. I think a weekly group was there playing d&d at the only table in the shop. We ordered our drinks and left.

name: Chris West
text: I love the shop. Totally cool retro look. Love the patio area out back. The guys that run the store are great to talk to and know what they are talking about when it comes to comics and anything else they sell. They are super nice guys.

name: Timothy Green
text:
Came in for a coffee. Server who was going to prepare my drink wiped his nose audibly across his open palm while waiting at the register for my order. Gross. Hard pass.

Update: Check out the Owner's response to this review. Just lovely. I never ordered btw, just excused myself politely and left. Find coffee elsewhere mates! Ye be warned.

resp.text: I prefer to give people an OPPORTUNITY to wash their hands before PREPARING my beverage. Otherwise my daily triggering isn't as fair as the safe place Im constantly demanding.  Those computer screens, along with cash and cards are much grosser that you'd think. Washing hands before TAKING the order just creates the need to wash them again. We wash hands 100% of the time before making ANY beverages. ALWAYS HAVE AND ALWAYS WILL. But yeah, that's gross, and probably embarrassing to the guy attempting to take your order. Downright deplorable. You know that feeling right?  We've all been there and it ALWAYS happens at the worst possible time.  What matters though, really, is the recovery. I hate that you had to leave so abruptly though, as you missed the part where he washed his hands before preparing the drink you ordered. It was good too. I know because I drank it. We love you either way. Even when we don't meet your expectations. We will put your feedback to good use and make it a learning experience.  It is our mission to look to the past and improve the future!!

name: Scot McKinney
text: Super customer service, great coffee, awesome selection of records and comics. A great place to shop and hangout, plus the patio is sweet!

name: N Flippo
text: If the city of Florence was a store, this would be it... Great coffee and drinks (try the coffee milkshake), a varied collection of comics as well they are willing to order for you if they don't have something, and vinyl records from vintage to new. Definitely stop by to grab a drink and browse or sit on the back patio!

resp.text: Word is bond

name: Will Mitchell (Captain Will)
text: I may visit others, but this is MY comic shop.  It's a small place because they've just got started, but the folks are great, and so is the coffee.  There's lots of vinyl records, if you're into that sort of thing.  My wife and I stop in at least once a week, and they're making comic collectors out of the both of us!

name: Tiffany Kilburn
text: Absolutely amazing caramel macchiato, (not overly sweet like Starbucks) Patrick was very friendly and informative. Lovely Patio to just chill while enjoying your coffee. Will definitely be a added delight to my normal routine.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words Tiffany!

name: Toni Serpa
text: Not a lot of anything it states in its name, but more than you'll find anywhere else around for hours. Record selection is minimal, comic selection is mostly newer items, and coffee wasn't half bad!

resp.text: Love It!!! Not half bad.

name: Ashley Harris
text: Great coffee with lots of flavor! Nice to see another local coffee shop. Plus there's plenty to look at, books and board games for hanging out, and you can do your music/comic shopping all in one stop!

name: Chicknwings
text: I've been coming here for over a month now, and absolutely love the environment and variety they offer.

resp.text: Thank you Chicknwings. We work hard to provide a unique environment and experience. Also, we really love chicken wings. So by default, we really love you!

name: Spencer Lane
text: Love this little shop. Staff are always welcoming and talkative. Vinyls, comic books, and coffee. Nothing bad about it.

name: Penny Queen
text: Good music, nice people, very quiet and peaceful.

resp.text: The BEST music! We try as much as we can to specialize in local, regional, and projects tied to the Shoals area. Also harder to find, exclusive, limited edition records, along with lots of under the radar stuff.  Thanks for your support!

name: Todd Beene
text: Fantastic locally owned comic, music, and coffee spot. The backyard is a crucial hang. Get some coffee, buy something, and spend some time out back for a great day.

name: ubermonkeyking
text: This is the best comic shop we have in this area. Guys are great and love their smoothies.

name: Andrew Lewis
text: Great selection of coffee, comics, and music including vinyl.  Nice patio to relax at.  Support your local record store!

name: Max Tew
text: Great coffee, great music, great staff. If you're looking for a place to work quietly, to talk to a stranger, or to just sit in a cozy room and enjoy a nice cup of coffee, this is the place.

name: Philip Gambrell
text: They have an amazing selection of records, books, tapes, comics, and CDs. Their coffee and smoothies are amazing, and the people are amazingly nice.

resp.text: Thank you, again and again.

name: QuaLude Cage
text: As always Great time with some awesome comics and sweet surrounding

name: Ray Martinez
text: Good comics selection. Fair prices. Nice clean store.

name: Callie White
text: Friendly employees, all very knowledgeable about music and comics. This is where I always go for new music and comic book releases.

name: Tim Elam
text: Great place to grab a cup of coffee and shop for a new comic book or vinyl record. Nice selection of books, music, and accessories.

name: June Howard Barr
text: Such a neat place. Coffee is probably my favorite in florence. The staff is so nice and the selection of records is great!

name: Steve Patterson
text: Super place to enjoy a great cup of coffee and shop for vantage records, t shirts and comic books.

name: Beautiful Noise Vinyl And Gaming Clips
text: This place is great and the owner is very friendly and knowledgeable about his products if you're in the Florence area this is your go to stop for harder to find records especially if you're into indie music

name: Michael Smith
text: Love it!

name: Jared Wallin
text: Cool little comic shop / record store / coffee bar all in one.

name: Pokeypuppy 105
text: Cleanliness and service isn't the best, but it is a neat experience for someone into comics

resp.text: Ouch. We've maintained a 99% Health Rating since day one.  Both owners have over 30 years combined in service industry management.  I'm curious if you ever gave us an opportunity to resolve your service issue before sharing it with the world?  Things happen and when they do we ALWAYS go above and beyond to make it right. Thank you for your feedback. We will continue to do our best!

name: Will Burhans
text: Nice store, great variety of drinks. Nice atmosphere.

name: Yolande Webster (Kabiu)
text: Nice comic book store.  Lots of selection.

resp.text: Thanks so much Yolande.  As a growth opportunity, how could we have earned that extra 🌟?

name: Jason Sassin
text: Great store with great owner and employees. Always a pleasure.

name: Brian Dunaway
text: Really cool place. Great selection and great staff.

name: John Tipler
text: I think they stopped carrying comics. Maybe they were going out of business? 🤔 Maybe.

name: Jeremy Woods
text: Great coffee. Great record selection. Great vibe.

name: Leslie Brown
text: Quaint local place! Vinyl and comic book junkies should totally check it out!

name: Lisa Evans The Fam
text: Great atmosphere , and very polite and respectful people working here.

resp.text: Lisa, we appreciate your kind words and value your business!!  For exclusive deals available only to regular customers, sign up for our newsletters through the "contact" page of our website @ www.blankcoffeecomicsrecords.com

name: Scott Norris
text: Perfect service and fun atmosphere

resp.text: That's the goal, at least. Must've caught us on a good day.

name: Joseph Brown
text: A cool little place to get your music and coffee

name: DC Roman
text: Coffe is pricey, but its good.

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed the coffee. We try hard to keep our prices competitive, as they are the same, or lower, than the other local options. Unfortunately, artisan coffees are just plain expensive.  Next time ask about our loyalty program, where every 7th drink is free. Thank you for stopping in.

name: Pruitt Holcombe
text: Good coffee, good smoothies, great comics and great staff!

name: Kim Santos
text: Excellent Coffee. Relaxed atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Cody H
text: Really awesome place with great vibes.

name: Jeremy Cravens
text: Love this place!

name: gamerguyAJ
text: Very cool place

name: Brian Schweighardt
text: Great place for vinyl comics and coffee.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Dylan Hodges
text: The people there were so nice

resp.text: Glad to know we're keeping it together, at least during hours of operation. We are a mess IRL.

name: C M Hughes
text: Great little comic book store

resp.text: Who you calling little?!?! But seriously; little store, big heart, and mediocre work ethic.

name: Cody Haithcock
text: Great place will be there again

name: Dustin Coan
text: Great little comic book and record store!

name: Hunter Parrish
text: Great shop, owners are super nice

resp.text: We think you're super nice too! Thanks.

name: Joey Turnage
text: Great shop with great people!

resp.text: Thank you, but as people we are seriously flawed. Every day we remain open is a miracle because those popular stereotypes about comic nerds and music snobs couldn't be more true. What we do have, however, are great customers.

name: Mary Cook
text: Very trendy, cute shop, great selection of comics

name: Brian Cameron
text: Good comic and record collection.

resp.text: Brian, thanks for the props! Better to respond late than never, right? We add dozens of rare and highly collectible records every week. For exclusive dscounts through our customer newsletter, contact us at www.blankccr.com

name: Kyle Jackson
text: K I yuug

name: mike wallace
text: Comic books, used albums, coffee and live music. what more could you want
